metadata.name: In Your Sleep Last Night
metadata.description:
In Your Sleep

in your sleep last night on my pillow  
let the fighting still flower show  
in every drop of rain full of sorrow  
it may collapse but still it's your ego

in your bed last night in her pillow  
i believe every thing you could show  
i believe that somewhere shoulder noah  
i believe who goes before you know

before each drop of rain a flower grows  
who's in my darkest night a candle glows  
i keep looking outside my pillow  
on every drop there's no one who knows

- Bijoux Earth
